description: This table holds the history of electronic prior authorization interactions.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EPA_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the status of the electronic prior authorization request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Request sent


Open


Closed


Denied


Appeal sent


Appeal open


Appeal denied


Appeal closed


Canceled


Waiting for manual response


Change payer


Approved


Appeal approved


Error


In Process

columns.name: PAYER_ORG_ID
columns.description: This item holds the payer the electronic prior authorization request was sent to.

columns.name: PAYER_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: PA_CASE_ID
columns.description: This item holds the electronic prior authorization case ID. It is generated by the payer for tracking the electronic prior authorization transaction in their internal system.  This value will not change during an electronic prior authorization interaction unless the payer is changed.

columns.name: PA_APPEAL_CASE_ID
columns.description: This item holds the electronic prior authorization appeal case ID. It is generated by the payer for tracking the electronic prior authorization appeal transaction in their internal system.  This value will not change during an electronic prior authorization interaction unless the payer is changed.

columns.name: ACTION_RECVD_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the instant that the electronic prior authorization action was received.

columns.name: ACTION_SENT_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the instant that the electronic prior authorization action response was sent.

columns.name: CANCEL_RSN_ID
columns.description: This item holds the reason that the electronic prior authorization request was canceled.

columns.name: CANCEL_RSN_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: E_APPEAL_SUPPORT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates if the payer supports receiving an electronic appeal.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: QUESN_START_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the first question associated with this electronic prior authorization action. The actual questions are stored in referral file (RFL) related group 9300.

columns.name: REPLY_DEADLINE_DT
columns.description: This item holds the deadline for replying to the electronic prior authorization questions.

columns.name: QUESN_SET_TITLE
columns.description: This item holds the question set title.

columns.name: QUESN_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: This item holds the phone number for the electronic prior authorization question set.

columns.name: QUESN_END_LINE
columns.description: This item holds the line number of the last question associated with this electronic prior authorization action. The actual questions are stored in referral file  (RFL) related group 9300.

columns.name: PA_CANCEL_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the result of a request to cancel an ePA request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Denied

columns.name: PA_CNCL_RSLT_RSN_ID
columns.description: This holds the code indicating why a cancel request was denied.

columns.name: PA_CNCL_RSLT_RSN_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: QUESN_SET_ID
columns.description: This item holds the ID of an electronic prior authorization question set.

columns.name: SEND_USER_ID
columns.description: This item holds the user ID of the last user who performed an action that populated the ePA Action Instant Sent item I RFL 9206.

columns.name: QUESN_FAX_NUM
columns.description: This item holds the fax number for the electronic prior authorization question set

columns.name: EPA_REPLY_TM
columns.description: Holds the time component of the deadline to reply, if available.

columns.name: EPA_RELATES_MSG
columns.description: This holds the message ID that ePA closed responses are related to.

columns.name: EPA_CLSED_RSP_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This holds the type of closed response that is stored on this line of data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PBM


3rd Party


Network

columns.name: EPA_FORM_URL
columns.description: This holds the URL pointing to a form to enter PA details.

columns.name: ATTACHMENT_REQ_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether an attachment is required as part of filling out this question set.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: E_APPEAL_SUPPORT_YN

columns.name: EXPECT_RESP_DATE
columns.description: This item holds the date by which a response is expected from the payer.

columns.name: EPA_BEN_INFO_MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the interface message that holds coordination of benefits information that applies to this prior authorization request.

columns.name: EPA_ATTACHMENT_ID
columns.description: This item holds the DCS record representing an ePA attachment.
